title: Minecraft 携带版 1.0.8 发布
author: 凛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 china521 于 2017-5-5 06:16 编辑 
正式版是Minecraft PE经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addons、Js插件与官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play与App Store等官方软件商城也会推送次更新。

转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
新内容：万智牌来到MINECRAFTMAGIC: THE GATHERING COMES TO MINECRAFT看,旅法师,我们最新的皮肤包Behold, Planeswalkers, our latest skin pack!好消息,旅法师!可怕怪物和死灵法师的灾难打破了他们的2D纸牌监狱,并且现在3D世界已经完全充满了恐惧.或者,换一种快乐的方式,万智牌皮肤包现在在PE/WIN10平台可用!欢呼!并且很快就会来到主机版!双重欢呼!Great news, Planeswalkers! A plague of terrifying monsters and necromancers have broken free of their 2D cardboard prisons, and are now fully 3D horrors terrorizing your world. Or, to put that in a happier way, the Magic the Gathering skin pack is available for Pocket and Windows 10 Edition now! Hooray! And it's coming to consoles very soon, too! DOUBLE HOORAY!我们已经"精心制作"了一些卡牌游戏史上最具代表性的任务,包括亡者女王莉莲娜,狮族的金鬃阿耶尼和希望天使艾维欣.我们询问了一位Minecraft皮肤设计师,Sarah Kisor,制作这样一个神奇的皮肤包是怎么样的:We've 'crafted up' some of the most iconic stars of the card game's history, including necromancy master Liliana Vess, lion-lookalike Ajani Goldmane, and archangel Avacyn. We asked one of the Minecraft skin artists, Sarah Kisor, about what it was like to work on such a magical pack:在万智牌皮肤包中调节复杂的人物以简单的Minecraft风格是一个有趣的挑战,但是难以置信的回报是看到他们以我们的风格来生活.每个人物都很复杂,所以我们必须着重于他们最具代表性的特征来使他们可以被像素化后也可以立刻被人辨认出来.我是一个完全的"知识猎犬"(这是一个真的用语吗?我正在做一个)所以在万智牌提供的广泛知识中工作是一件特别有意思的人事情.The Magic pack was an interesting challenge reconciling the complexity of the characters with the simplicity of Minecraft, but incredibly rewarding to see them come to life in our style. Each character is intricately detailed, so it was imperative that we focused on their most iconic features in order to make them immediately recognizable as their awesome pixelated selves. I myself am a complete lore-hound (is that a real term? I'm making it one) so it was especially fun working within the extensive lore the world of Magic the Gathering had to offer.SARAH KISOR
As always, a few of these skins are completely free so you can try them for yourself now!像往常一样,这些皮肤中一部分是完全免费的,现在你可以自己试试他们
  
 
 或者你觉得我们把你喜爱的万智牌角色变成方块和可爱是一种冒犯的话,欢迎发送你的仇恨邮件到: anyonebutus@notarealemail.com 或者发推给 @lalalalawearenotlistening Or, if you think us taking your favourite MTG characters and making them blocky and adorable is sacrilege, send your hate mail to anyonebutus@notarealemail.com or Tweet @lalalalawearenotlistening .或者承认它是伟大的并且欣赏皮肤包吧!Or just admit it's great and enjoy the pack!原文 By Tom Stone 2017年5月4日 :https://minecraft.net/zh-hans/ar ... ing-comes-minecraft译文 By china521 2017年5月5日 : http://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-690414-1-1.htmlBUG修复：修复了使用辐射混搭包时会产生崩溃的问题
